author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-4429: smokeTestRelease requires version is format X.Y.Z[-ALPHA|-BETA]

author: markt
msg: Move the cache for the attributes listed below from the Processor to the SocketWrapper as they are fixed for the lifetime of the socket and the Processor gets recycled on every request
This reduces object allocation during my load test by ~30% (the allocations were triggered by the AccessLogValve logging the remote IP)
